title: How to Cook Sweet Potato and Corn Soup

steps.headline: Prepare ingredients.
steps.description: Peel, dice, mince, and chop vegetables as appropriate.

steps.headline: Sauté diced onion in oil until translucent.
Add carrots and continue to Sauté until tender.
Add minced garlic when carrots are nearly done.
Add sweet potatoes, white potatoes, corn kernels (with liquid), and water.
Season with salt and ground black pepper.
Simmer until all vegetables are tender.
Puree until barely smooth, using a stick blender.
steps.description: For a chunkier texture, use a potato masher.

text: Prepare ingredients. Peel, dice, mince, and chop vegetables as appropriate. Sauté diced onion in oil until translucent.  Add carrots and continue to Sauté until tender.  Add minced garlic when carrots are nearly done.  Add sweet potatoes, white potatoes, corn kernels (with liquid), and water.  Season with salt and ground black pepper.  Simmer until all vegetables are tender.  Puree until barely smooth, using a stick blender. For a chunkier texture, use a potato masher. Finished!
